content:
# We have successfully gathered 10 iron ore in addition to the 10 coal already in our inventory. 
# With these resources, we can now craft some essential items to facilitate automation.

# Step 5: Craft a stone furnace using the resources we have collected.
craft_item('stone-furnace', quantity=1)  # Craft one stone furnace.
print(f"Inventory after crafting: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Step 6: Craft a mining drill to automate resource collection.
craft_item('burner-mining-drill', quantity=1)  # Craft one burner mining drill.
print(f"Inventory after crafting: {inspect_inventory()}")
